question_text: Which of the following are advantages of redundant server power supplies? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They reduce heat output compared to standard units
They improve system uptime in case of power supply failure
They automatically share power load under normal conditions
They eliminate the need for UPS or surge protection
correct_answer: They improve system uptime in case of power supply failure
They automatically share power load under normal conditions
explanation: Redundant supplies offer load balancing, uptime assurance, and hot-swappable design. However, they still benefit from UPS and do not necessarily reduce heat.
